title: Agonizing from a distance: 13 people have died and 51 have COVID-19 at Anson Place - CBC.ca
description: Agonizing from a distance: 13 people have died and 51 have COVID-19 at Anson Place CBC.ca COVID-19: Anson Place death toll reaches 13 Brantford Expositor View Full coverage on Google News
content:
Thirteen people have died and half the residents have tested positive for COVID-19 at Anson Place Care Centre in Hagersville, leaving family members anxious and eagerly awaiting news.
The Haldimand-Norfolk Health Unit confirmed Saturday night that 51 residen… [+2784 chars]
